copycwd.description: Copies current working directory to clipboard

edit-command-line.description: Allows to edit current buffer using default text editor (see $EDITOR)

down-line-or-beginning-search.description: Move down a line in the buffer, or if already at the bottom line, search forward in the history for a line beginning with the first word in the buffer. Like down-line-or-search, but uses the whole line prefix up to the cursor position for searching forwards.

up-line-or-beginning-search.description: Move up a line in the buffer, or if already at the top line, search backward in the history for a line beginning with the first word in the buffer. Like up-line-or-search, but uses the whole line prefix up to the cursor position for searching backwards.
